test=int(raw_input())
while test:
    n=int(raw_input())
    check={}
    count=0
    for i in range(n):
        s,v=map(str,raw_input().split())
        if s not in check:
            if v == '+':
                count+=1
            else:
                count-=1
            check[s]=v
        else:
            temp=check[s]
            if temp==v:
                pass
            else:
                if v=='+':
                    count+=2
                else:
                    count-=2
            check[s]=v
    print count
    test=test-1
